name: iTunes Cover Flow Data File
summary: Learn about .ITC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ITC files are referenced by iTunes but are not meant to be opened manually. You can download album artwork for songs in your iTunes library by selecting "Get Album Artwork" from the Advanced menu in iTunes.

description: Contains album artwork and metadata for songs that have cover artwork; used by iTunes to speed up browsing songs in Cover Flow mode; saved by default within the ~/Music/iTunes/Album Artwork/Local/... directory.
